recipes.title: Old Fashioned Potato Salad
recipes.description: This is potato salad the old-fashioned way, with eggs, celery and relish. It's really good to serve with chili.
ingredientLines: 5 Potatos, 3 Eggs, 1 cup chopped celery, 1/2 cup chopped unions, 1/2 cup sweet pickle relish ---, 1/4 teaspoon garlic salt, 1/4 teaspoon celery salt, 1 tablespoon prepared mustard, ground black pepper to taste, 1/4 cup mayonnaise

recipes.title: Tomato & basil Omelette
recipes.description: The classic combination of tomato and basil makes this simple omelette really sing.
ingredientLines: 2 Sprigs of fresh basil, 3 Cherry tomatoes, 2 large free-range eggs, olive oil

recipes.title: Classic tomato spaghetti
recipes.description: A great introduction to pasta for kids â€“ loads of fun to eat, and a brilliant base for adding all kinds of other fresh ingredients.
recipes.ingredientLines: 1 bunch of fresh basil, 1 medium onion, 2 cloves of garlic, 1 kg ripe tomatoes , or 2 x 400g tins quality chopped tomatos, olive oil, 1 tablespoon red wine or balsamic vinegar, 480 g dried wholewheat spaghetti, 15 g Parmesan cheese

recipes.title: Cauli-kale sausage bake
recipes.description: This cheap, crowd-pleasing meal is easy, hearty fare. This needs hardly any prep and it's pure comfort food, with a good helping of veg and hot bubbling cheese
recipes.ingredientLines: 680g cauliflower florets, 180g sliced kale, 1 tbsp olive oil, 400g sausages, meat squeezed out, 700g cheese sauce, 100g cheddar, mixed leaves, to serve (optional)

recipes.title: Grilled Deviled Chickens Under a Brick
recipes.description: Grilling these chickens under a heavy weight will help them cook quickly and evenly, leaving them crisp and juicy.
ingredientLines: 4 baby chickens (poussins) or cornish hens (about 1 1/4 pounds each), or 4 chicken breast halves
1 tablespoon crushed red-pepper flakes, or to taste
